website_summaries.verdict: We can't recommend the HP Photosmart D5360 when the competition's all-in-one offers a lot more for the same price.
pros: can print directly on the surface of special CDs and DVDs
cons: print quality needs lots of improvement

customer_reviews.title: D5360 does all I need for a song
customer_reviews.text: The HP Photosmart D5360 does everything I need: Double sided, black or full color, 4x6 or 5x7 photos, and direct onto inkjet-printable CD's. I don't use the built-in digicam memory card features, but they don't interfere. Since HP consumables are pricey, I've used Costco's (thinner) 4x6 photo paper with no problems so far. For the money, I'm astonished with this unit so I don't mind giving HP a few extra bucks for the ink. The included software has more bells & whistles than I would prefer, but it gets the job done. All in all, I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Metals Geek

customer_reviews.title: Love this printer:
customer_reviews.text: This is the second D5300 HP printer I've owned. The one I owned before this purchase,I was unable to print on paper but I could print on CD's/DVD's. The roller-or-wheel on the printing mechanism was broken which is why I purchased another HP D5300 printer. I LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: CLARENCE GREEN

customer_reviews.title: B. Robbins
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this printer specifically for printing double-sided color documents from Microsoft Word. For the price, this is an EXCELLENT printer! It does indeed do duplex-printing and is rather fast. It is designed for small ink cartridges, so it runs out of ink relatively fast; however, you can purchase extra large ink cartridges for this printer, which makes it an exceptional buy. Supposedly, it has many other features as well (printing on CD, label making, etc.), but I do use those functions.
customer_reviews.author: B. Robbins

customer_reviews.title: A very reliable printer.
customer_reviews.text: After many years of faithful service our previous HP D5360 quit working. We recently purchased another HP D5360 to replace it. The capability of printing directly to printable CDs is the one of the main features we use.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd V. Lindberry, Jr

customer_reviews.title: About my printer I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Yes, my new refurbished HP D5360 printer meets my expectations to the highest Degree. Thank you for sending it to me after having bought it, as HP tells me that they no longer make a printer with inkjet labeling capability on CD or DVD. I just might order the two remaining printers just like it but are used. Just to have them on hand. Thanks again so much. Larry Carbine
customer_reviews.author: Larry Wayne Carbine

customer_reviews.title: best printer
customer_reviews.text: this is the second one I have had and it is fast and does two sided in a wink. also a great work horse as we do hundreds of copies on some days.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Dean

customer_reviews.title: replaced my d5360
customer_reviews.text: Had enjoyed my printer so much so that when it died, i went looking for another, this barely used unit was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: tominaz

customer_reviews.title: it works beautifully.
customer_reviews.text: The printer needed a new ink cartridge, but after changing that, it works beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Weldon C. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: HP D5360 USED
customer_reviews.text: I knew that I was purchasing a used printer but I thought that it would print my 4 by 6 photos. Ever time I try to print the 4 by 6 or 5 by 7 it would jam. Always jam. The 8 by ten were ok. I will not by another used item again. I learned my lesson.
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: I Love This Printer!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a Fantastic Printer, first off I only paid $45.99!!! I had bought this printer to print on DVDs, It does a Great Job!!! Second, This has a Duplex attachment so you can automatically print on TWO SIDES...Great!!! Thirdly, It prints 5X7 photos in Only 2 Minutes on the highest setting, Fantastic!!! The Clarity and Detail of this printer is Incredible. For the PRICE I Paid, This is a GREAT Printer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Brenner

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you want to print on CDs/DVDs.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this printer a year ago and loved it (past tense). However, when my computer died and I had to replace it, I cannot get HP Photosmart Premier software anymore because HP has discontinued it. Now I have a printer which is only good for color printing. That would be okay, but I bought this printer just to print CDs. (I already have three other color printers.) I would sell this one cheep!
customer_reviews.author: RP in Shawnee

customer_reviews.title: good printer- watch out for paper jam
customer_reviews.text: HI I loved this printer til a paperjam. Pulled out the sheet and a black roller thing shot out.. it fed the paper in.. oops.Went to replace with same model. NO longer available. so I upgraded... still a good printer. Just be easy with the paperjams people...
customer_reviews.author: Debbie W.

customer_reviews.title: Makes excellent photo prints, a problem knowing which ink cartridge to change
customer_reviews.text: This printer makes excellent color prints up to letter size, and quite quickly. It only has two ink cartridges to keep at hand, the XL variety being the best to buy by far. The printer is supplied with ink cartrides #74 and #75. There are also a #99 and #100, but it's not clear what they are for. Even more annoying is that when the printer sends a message "Replace ink cartridge", it doesn't say which one! You have to guess! Ron Light
customer_reviews.author: Ron Light

customer_reviews.title: Paper jam killed my D5360, too
customer_reviews.text: I got the D5360 for Christmas last year. Used it a lot and it worked great. That is, until tonight. Tonight I had my first paper jam -- gave the offending sheet a good tug and I, too, discovered the black roller that feeds the paper. It broke off and now no more printing.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe how much ink this uses
customer_reviews.text: The print quality is good, but this printer uses an unbelievable amount of ink. I need to print a lot of black and white copies and I have to replace the cartridge every two weeks or so. I'm going to start counting how many pages I get per cartridge - 100? Maybe 150? This machine is so expensive to run that I'm going to have to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: A Critical Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great lower priced printer
customer_reviews.text: My HP D5360 has been the most reliable printer our office has used. I have more expensive higher end HP printers, and they fall short as far as reliablity. I like it so much, when we expanded our office we bought another one. I bought a third one for my parents too. They're great!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Good for about 100 pages. Then the hardware shuts down and says its jammed...permanently. (planned obsolescence)
customer_reviews.author: James Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Review of HP Photosmart 5360 priunter
customer_reviews.text: This purchase went smoothly and with no problems in the process. I would buy again from this source.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Simpson

product_meta.title: HP D5360 Photosmart Printer
product_meta.description: HP D5360 Photosmart Printer. Customize your CDs and DVDs with your own photos and text. Expand your color range with 6 ink color, using the optional HP photo inkjet print cartridge /not included, sold separately. Make memories last print photos that resist fading for generations by using HP Premium Plus Photo Paper. Share smudge and smear resistant photos right from the printer by using HP Advanced Photo Paper. Easily edit, print and share photos, using included HP Photosmart Essential Software. Get quick printing up to 32 ppm black and up to 24 ppm color and print photos in as fast as 26 seconds. Save paper by using the included duplexer to print on both sides of the paper. Print more affordably with fewer cartridge changes, using optional high capacity inkjet print cartridges /not included, sold separately. Print what you see HP Smart Web Printing ensures you get useable web pages without cutoff edges. Optimize print quality for various kinds of paper with the HP automatic paper type sensor. Experience easy photo printing, using a 1.5 inch display. Preview and print photos without a PC, using a 1.5 inch display. Print photos in a snap without a PC using compatible memory cards. Start HP Photosmart Express to effortlessly share, save and print photos. Touch the HP Red eye Removal button to easily remove red eye from your photos. Print photos without swapping paper the automated photo tray engages whenever you print photos.
feature_bullets: 32 ppm Black, Up to 24 ppm Color, Photos as Fast as 26 Seconds
1.5 in LCD Display to Preview and Print Photos

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.6 out of 5 stars25 ratings2.6 out of 5 stars
